All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAppointmentController
    Adds a new Appointment
    AddCustomerController
    Adds a new customer as per the class title
    AlertMessage
    Instead of cluttering up the Controllers with alert message code I wrote a class for them.
    Appointment
    Appointment Class
    AppointmentDao
    Appointment Dao interface for CRUD operations as per the design pattern on tutorialspoint.com/design_pattern/data_access_object_pattern.htm
    AppointmentDaoImpl
    AppointmentDao implementation class as per the design pattern on tutorialspoint.com/design_pattern/data_access_object_pattern.htm
    Contact
    Contact class of the contact table
    ContactDao
    Contact Dao design pattern as per tutorialspoint.com/design_pattern/data_access_object_pattern.htm
    ContactDaoImpl
    Contact Dao implementation as per the design pattern on tutorialspoint.com/design_pattern/data_access_object_pattern.htm
    Country
    country class for the countries table
    CountryDao
    Country Doa as per design pattern on tutorialspoint.com/design_pattern/data_access_object_pattern.htm
    CountryDaoImp
    Country Doa Implements CRUD methods for the country method
    Customer
    customer class for the customer table
    CustomerDao
    customer data access object interface as per Doa design pattern for CRUD operations
    CustomerDaoImp
    Implantation of the Customer Dao design pattern for CRUD operations of the customer table
    DBConnection
    class is called to connect to the database
    DBQuery
    class for the queries to be processed
    DoaLists
    group of Observable Lists storing the objects used in the program
    FirstLevelDivisionDao
    FirstLevelDivision data access object for CRUD operations
    FirstLevelDivisionDaoImpl
    Implementation of the first Level Division data access object for CRUD operations
    FirstLevelDivisions
    FirstLevelDivision class for the firleveldivision table
    Login
    this the first model class used in the application the main(String[] args) is here
    Login_Controller
    Controls the Login view
    Main_Controller
    main view controller
    ModifyAppointmentController
    This class is the controller for the modify Appointment view, which updates and deletes appointments from the program/database
    ModifyCustomerController
    modify a selected customer from a populated list
    ReportsController
    Reports controller
    SwitchView
    This class is to prevent the controller classes from getting cluttered with switching view code
    TimeZoneClass
    I noticed the local timezone was being called a lot so I made this class to simplify the code
    User
    user class for the user table
    UsersDao
    Data Access Object for users for CRUD operations
    UsersDaoImpl
    Implementation of the user data access object for CRUD operations
    Validation
    Validation class to keep the code organized
